Standard: 祝贺你，成功改变了命运。
被一个恶棍拥有，流入黑市，或者被烧成灰烬，这太可怕了
所以我借给你编织命运的力量。
ENG: So I lend you the power to weave destiny

Standard: 我会给你一段时间享受你在博物馆的生活，但剩下时间的是属于我的了。
ENG: I will give you some time to enjoy your life in the museum

Standard: 克洛托这招真是屡试不爽

ENG: Looking at the piles of gems

Standard: 你感觉自己再也出不去了
ENG: you feel like you can’t get out anymore

Standard: 深夜，图书馆二层，储藏室门口。
我可以帮你加快时间，你想直接进入选择吗
ENG: I can help you speed up the time

Standard: 左侧口袋中有一剂{b}药粉{/b}。
ENG: There is a dose of powder in the left pocket

Standard: 淡淡的草药香，提神醒脑。
ENG: This poison has a slight herbal fragrance

Standard: 谨慎！感冒患者切忌与{b}酒{/b}同时服用
ENG: Cautious! Cold patients should not take it with alcohol at the same time

Standard: 或可引发严重的头晕、无力、意识混乱
ENG: or they'll experience a period of drowsiness and confusion

Standard: 她最近一直在家，但是她得了流感。
ENG: She has been at home recently

Standard: 有人传染给了她，而且他也是一个守卫。
ENG: Someone infected her and he is also a guard

Standard: 我不会放过他的，我有一个间接报复的方法
如果那个护士从他手底下逃跑\n\n
ENG: If the nurse escapes from his surveillance

Standard: 那么老板看到他醉成那样{w=1.0s}，不用经过我的手，就能让他直接滚蛋。
ENG: The boss would think he is so drunk and kick him out

Standard: 最有可能的是位置是书房。
ENG: The most likely hiding place is the study room

Standard: 但老板怕有人私吞，除了他没人能进去。
ENG: But the boss is afraid that someone will embezzle the property

Standard: 桌上放着一桶新鲜的啤酒和数个啤酒杯。
ENG: There is a barrel of fresh beer and several beer glasses on the table

Standard: 守卫们没事的时候来这里小酌一杯提神。
ENG: The guards come here for a refreshing drink when they are bored

Standard: 门外有了响动，你回头一看，下一班轮岗的守卫来了。
ENG: There is a noise outside the door. You look back and see that

Standard: 图书馆的正厅除了中间的一块面积是空出来的，其余密布着高耸的书架。
ENG: Except for the area in the middle of the main hall of the library

Standard: 上方悬挂着华丽的吊灯，亮得有些刺眼
ENG: There is a gorgeous chandelier hanging above

Standard: 嘿，说你呢！到点了，赶紧走。

ENG: Pour the powder into the glasses

Standard: 我将一些药剂倒入每个酒杯。
ENG: I pour the powder into the beer glasses

Standard: 人生在世，没什么不能忍的。
ENG: There is nothing unbearable in life

Standard: 我感觉好像跳过了什么？
ENG: I feel like I skipped something?

Standard: 你会直接进入选择的阶段
ENG: You will directly enter the choices

Standard: 老板命令我看守这个女孩
ENG: The boss ordered me to guard this girl

Standard: 并拷问出月光宝石的下落。
ENG: And tortured the whereabouts of the moonlight gem

Standard: 可要说那女孩嘴可真严，几天了都没有招
算了，在交班之前我还有别的事要确认。
我一瞬间闪身躲了起来，纵身一跃，趴在房梁上。
ENG: I dodged and hid for a moment

Standard: 吊灯上的玻璃珠子反射着璀璨的光线，在月光的照拂下更是莹莹发光。
ENG: The glass beads on the chandelier reflect the bright light

Standard: 风险太大，万一引来守卫，我很难脱身。
ENG: Too risky. If the guards are attracted

Standard: 要不要用钩锁打破酒瓶，分散他们的注意...
ENG: Should I break the bottle with a hook to distract them

Standard: 现在随时都有被发现的危险，
ENG: Now I might be discovered at any time

Standard: 先进电闸房把大厅的电路关掉，这样在黑暗中就能自由行动了
ENG: First enter the switch room and turn off the circuit in the hall
Go to the switch room first

Standard: 据说这里有一块宝石，可以换一大笔筹码
但是麻烦的是这些看守的家伙
根据我的经验，宝石藏在二层书房可能性比较大。
ENG: I guess the gem is more likely to be hidden in the study on the second floor. Rich people normaly do this.

Standard: 其他的房间都被这些守卫搜过了，剩下的可能是在一层的大厅中。
ENG: The other rooms have been searched by these guards

Standard: 档案室里有些奇怪的声音。
ENG: Some strange noises in the next room

Standard: 我抓住了金属链子，跳上了吊灯。
ENG: I grab the metal chain and jump on the chandelier

Standard: 蓝色的光芒，其中的一颗尤为炫目。它巧妙地隐藏在月光中。
ENG: One of them is particularly dazzling. It is cleverly hidden in the moonlight

Standard: 难怪一直没有人能找到！
ENG: No wonder nobody found it for a long time

Standard: 如果不是这突然的黑暗让它绽放光芒，它就像吊灯上镶嵌的一粒玻璃。
ENG: If it weren’t for the sudden darkness to make it shine

Standard: 我可以用钩锁抓住吊灯的顶部
ENG: I can grab the top of the chandelier with the hook
and then jump up to pick up the gems

Standard: 或者把吊灯整个扯下来，趁守卫聚集在下面时砸晕他们。
守卫太多了，目前我无法将他们引开。
ENG: Guards are on duty. I can’t distract them at the moment

Standard: 蓝色的宝石在上空闪闪发光。
最后看了它一眼，在守卫冲过来之前从窗户跳了出去。
亲爱的弟弟，我知道你会独自来这里，不让任何人有可能偷走你的利益。
至于宝石，我没有赠给别人，以防他们遭到你的黑手。
就让它被掩埋在无人知道的角落好了。

ENG: Turn the letter to the back

Standard: 嘭——整个图书馆瞬间暗了下来，只有幽蓝的月光从窗外溜进。
ENG: Boom——The whole library was darkened in an instant
There seems to be a letter on the table

Standard: 对只看得见它的财富价值的人
ENG: For those who only care about how much it is worth

Standard: 打着最亮的手电筒，也永远都找不到它。

ENG: Continue to search in the study

Standard: 撬开锁，贴着门缝闪进了书房中。
我感觉好像跳过了什么？
ENG: I feel like I skipped something

Standard: Select your preferred language\n请选择你偏好的语言
据报道，一名女子涉嫌与情夫杀害丈夫，现已失踪。
小偷在守卫发现他之前从窗户溜走了。
ENG: The thief slipped through the window before the guard found him

Standard: 可怜的护士，等待她的是更可怕的明天和无止的暴打。
ENG: Poor nurse. What awaits her is a more terrifying tomorrow and endless beatings

Standard: 老板找不到宝石，他将图书馆拆得一干二净。所有的物品被卖到了二手市场。
ENG: The boss couldn't find the gems

Standard: 直到有一天，一个古董商人发现了它，他用沾染着钞票气息的手指沉醉地摩挲着宝石。
小偷在守卫发现他之前从窗户溜走了。
ENG: The thief slipped through the window before the guard found him

Standard: 护士趁着守卫们争抢着宝石，摸黑逃出了图书馆。
ENG: When the guards scrambled for gems

Standard: 其中一个幸运的家伙抢到了，他用它在还清了高利贷，过上了平静的生活。
我們在一趟尚未完成，也不會完成的旅行中。
ENG: We are on a journey that has not yet been completed and will not be completed.

Standard: 進退不得，未來亦不可知

ENG: The thief slipped through the window

Standard: 护士发现地上的宝石，她摘了下来，放进了口袋。
ENG: The nurse found the gem on the ground. She picked it off and put it in her pocket

Standard: 逃出图书馆后，她将宝石送给了珠宝博物馆。{w=1s}这是另外的故事了。
ENG: She gave the gems to the Jewelry Museum after escaping from the library. {w=1s}This is another story

Standard: 小偷在守卫发现他之前从窗户溜走了。
ENG: The thief slipped through the window before the guard found him

Standard: 护士趁着着火时的一片混乱，摸黑逃出了图书馆。
ENG: The nurse took advantage of the chaos during the fire and escaped from the library in the dark

Standard: 宝石在大火中和成百上千的书一起，化作了灰烬。
ENG: The gem was turned into ashes in the fire along with hundreds of books

Standard: 小偷摘下了宝石，并用它在赌场赢了一大笔钱后，输给了对家。
ENG: The thief took the gem and used it to win a large sum of money in the casino before losing to the opponent

Standard: 护士趁着着火时的一片混乱，摸黑逃出了图书馆。
ENG: The nurse took advantage of the chaos during the fire and escaped from the library in the dark

Standard: 小偷摘下了宝石，并用它在赌场赢了一大笔钱后，输给了对家。
ENG: The thief took the gem and used it to win a large sum of money in the casino before losing to the opponent

Standard: 可怜的护士，等待她的是更可怕的明天和无止的暴打。
接下来，在做出重要选择的时刻，我会给你提示
ENG: Next time you make crucial decisions I will help you

Standard: 在这个游戏中，你做了{$Count}次选择
你是否需要额外的帮助呢

ENG: I can give you some hints

Standard: 或许你可以试着帮助护士，她会保护宝石
ENG: Maybe you can try to help the nurse--she will protect the gem
The bruise on my body is still a bit painful

Standard: 房间里空空如也， 能搜的都被洗劫一了。
这个家伙好像生病了，或是中了毒
ENG: This guy seems to be sick or poisoned

Standard: 声音引来了楼下其他的守卫，又将我揍了一顿，我的伤更重了。
ENG: The sound drew other guards downstairs--Oh no!

Standard: 我所知道的可行的出口只有一层的后门。
ENG: The only possible exit I know is a back door

Standard: 但是如果从唯一的楼梯走，需要绕道对面，很有可能中途被发现。
ENG: But if I go downdtairs from the opposite side

Standard: "砰——" 我重重地撞在了什么东西上。
我无法确定，什么时候守卫会朝这边走来，甚至是走上楼梯。
ENG: I'm not sure when the guards will step here

Standard: 再不走可能就被打得没命了。走你——
ENG: I might be in danger if I don't leave. Fire in the hole

Standard: 不能让他发出声音，引来其他守卫。
ENG: Don’t let him make a sound to attract other guards

Standard: 我集中用力击打他的要害，他终于晕了过去
ENG: I hit his vitals and he finally fainted

Standard: 翻了翻这个家伙的外套，从口袋里找到一个打火机。
ENG: I flipped through this guy’s jacket and found a lighter in his pocket
I'm looking for a way to go

Standard: 他们似乎发现了什么，在看着吊灯？
趁他们转移了注意力，我可以溜了。
ENG: I can slip away while they are distracted

Standard: 如果能点燃，就能制造混乱，趁机离开。
我实在不忍心让这些藏书消失在火海，还是算了吧。
ENG: I really can’t bear to let these books disappear into the fire

Standard: 趴在门口，你从门下方的缝看到一双守卫的皮靴。
ENG: You see a pair of guard boots from the seam under the door

Standard: 嘿，你们看上面，好像有什么东西在发光。

ENG: The guards flocked to the second floor

Standard: 趁这个空挡，正好可以从后门溜出去。
ENG: Now I can just sneak out through the back door

Standard: {w=1s} 好像有个影子从楼上闪过。或许是看错了。
ENG: There seemed to be a shadow flashing upstairs. Maybe I'm dazzled
Throw the lighter to the table

Standard: 我用双手撑住上半身，从地板上爬了起来
ENG: I supported my upper body with my hands and got up from the floor

Standard: 我被关在这里，都是因为有人想要得到一块宝石
ENG: I’m locked here because someone wants a gem

Standard: 据说它笼罩着神奇的蓝色光芒，像月光一样，传闻都说是无价之宝。
ENG: It is said that it emits a beautiful blue light--like moonlight. People think it is virtually priceless.

Standard: 这个图书馆本来属于我的上一任雇主。
ENG: This library originally belonged to my previous employer

Standard: 他去世之前，我是他的护士，也是他唯一能接触的朋友。
他的弟弟，一个铁公鸡，老恶棍在他病逝前软禁了他
他以为去世前，老头子把藏宝地点告诉了我，甚至他怀疑就在我手里
ENG: He thought that before he died，the old man told me where the gem is hidden or even it has been given to me.

Standard: 我对什么宝石没有兴趣，我只想逃出这里
ENG: I am not interested in any gems. I just want to escape here

Standard: 我感觉好像跳过了什么？
ENG: I feel like I skipped something

Standard: 我感觉好像跳过了什么？
ENG: I feel like I skipped something
